title: Covid-19 Tracker
text: Developed a Python bot that scrapes and texts daily Covid-19 statistics (cases, deaths, death rate) to recipients, providing them with timely and crucial information.

title: Meke
alt: Picture of Meke's addition skill being played
text: Led a team of 3 developers in building a gamified mobile math-learning app for elementary students. Collaborated with 2 designers to create an engaging UI/UX. Won 1st place at a school hackathon.

title: MaskUp
alt: Picture of MaskUp's live detection feature.
text: Built a web app that uses computer vision to detect face masks in real-time. The app also provides data visualizations and statistics on mask usage.

title: EnviroHelp
alt: Picture of the homepage of EnviroHelp.
text: Developed a tool that helps users determine if an item is recyclable by allowing them to upload a picture of it.

title: Focale
alt: Picture of the Focale chrome extension popup
text: Engineered a Chrome extension to help students with time management and study pacing. This tool has achieved a user base of over 1000 active users.

title: Spotion
alt: Picture of Spotion's landing page
text: Created a web app that leverages AI to generate 50-song Spotify playlists based on the mood detected in a user's selfie.

title: LiveTranslate
alt: Picture of Live Translate's landing page
text: Built a real-time translation tool that converts English speech and text into 6 different languages, breaking down communication barriers!

title: AWS Lambda Workshop
alt: Screenshot of AWS Lambda Workshop from serverless days
text: Presented a workshop on building a serverless API with AWS Lambda at the 2021 Serverless Days Student Edition conference, teaching students how to create a cat image API from scratch.

title: CounselorBot
alt: Screenshot of CounselorBot's download page
text: Developed a GitHub bot that provides autonomous guidance to students navigating through GitHub learning repositories, by creating issues (assignments) and auto-grading students' pull requests.

title: Valence Robotics Website
alt: Picture of Valence Robotics's landing page
text: Led the development of the official website for Valence Robotics (FRC Team #8429), a non-profit FIRST robotics team, establishing their online presence.

title: UniHeart
alt: Picture of UniHeart's landing page
text: Engineered a web app that utilizes two from-scratch machine learning algorithms to detect heart disease from home, making health monitoring more accessible..

title: #IAmCS Website
alt: Picture of #IAmCS's landing page
text: Constructed the website for #IAmCS, a North Carolina-wide initiative to expose students to computer science and STEM careers, supporting the next generation of tech talent.

title: The Coding Foundation Website
alt: Picture of TCF website
text: Built the official website for The Coding Foundation, a non-profit that provides coding lessons to students, expanding their reach and impact.

title: Bit Project Website
alt: Picture of Bit Project's landing page
text: Developed the website for Bit Project, a 501(c)(3) non-profit that offers free mentorship programs to students, helping to bridge the gap in tech education.

title: Durham Meals on Wheels 2021 Report Website
alt: Picture of Durham Meals on Wheels's landing page
text: Created the 2021 annual report website for Durham Meals on Wheels, effectively showcasing the impact of their charitable work to the community.

title: University of North Carolina @ Wilmington Wang Lab Website
alt: Picture of The Wang Lab's home page
text: Built a 9-page website for a research lab with 30,000 monthly visitors and wrote 12 pages of technical documentation to ensure easy maintenance by lab staff.

title: RiemannAI
alt: Picture of RiemanAI' home page
text: Developed a web app that can summarize, translate, and save spoken text, providing a powerful tool for communication and information processing.

title: ClimateSafe
alt: Picture of ClimateSafe mounted on a robot dog
text: Engineered an autonomous air-quality sensing unit using a Heltec ESP32 microcontroller, contributing to environmental monitoring and safety.

title: Tuning Your Musical Instrument with Machine Learning
alt: Thumbnail of workshop slide titled "Tuning Your Instrument with Machine Learning"
text: Created and delivered a 45-minute workshop for middle school students on using machine learning to tune musical instruments, making complex topics accessible.

title: Text Summarization using Python
alt: Thumbnail of workshop slide titled "Text Summarization using Python"
text: Developed and filmed a workshop on Natural Language Processing for students with no prior programming experience, providing a gentle introduction to AI.

title: Markdown Parser
alt: Thumbnail of the homepage of Markdown Parser
text: Developed a web-based markdown parser that converts markdown to HTML and supports file creation, viewing, and sharing, enhancing productivity for developers and writers.

title: The Internet's Journal
alt: Thumbnail of the homepage of The Internet's Journal
text: Built a full-stack web app for users to create and share journal entries, with features like liking, reporting, moderation, and popularity-based ranking.

title: Caffeine 2.0
alt: Thumbnail of the homepage of Caffeine 2.0
text: Created a web app that uses computer vision to detect when a user blinks and plays a sound to prevent them from falling asleep at their computer!

title: Calendo
alt: Thumbnail of the homepage of Calendo
text: A gamified to-do list app designed for school systems to increase student engagement. Won the Education Track at HackGT X.

title: Aire
alt: Thumbnail of the homepage of Aire
text: Co-developed a web app that generates personalized resumes and cover letters based on a job description, helping users to tailor their job apps more effectively.

title: Apache Airvata MFT UI
alt: Thumbnail of the homepage of Airvata MFT UI
text: Built a desktop app for managing files between cloud and local storage, improving user experience for a complex data transfer system.

title: Cybershuttle Local Agent
alt: Thumbnail of the homepage of Cybershuttle Local Agent UI
text: Developed a local agent used by 300 scientists to submit and manage experiments on supercomputers, streamlining the research workflow.

title: GT Class Reviews
alt: Thumbnail of the homepage of GT Class Reviews
text: Created a platform for Georgia Tech students to review and rate their classes, fostering a community of academic feedback and transparency.

title: GT Academic Calendars
alt: Thumbnail of the homepage of GT Academic Calendars
text: Built a web app that visualizes Georgia Tech's academic calendar, used by 5,000 students to easily track important dates and deadlines.

title: Bike Rack Finder
alt: Bike Rack Finder homepage
text: Developed an iOS application that helps users find nearby bicycle racks, currently in beta testing and soon to be available to the public. Has 100,000+ bike racks.

title: Airavata Research Service
alt: Airavata Research Catalog homepage
text: Built a full-stack web app that allows scientists to share repositories, datasets, notebook, and AI models.
